start_message.other: Welcome to The King Says bot that can assist you plays in your party game plays. Create a session, send invitation link, choose a King and follow his instructions. Press /help to see how to send commands and their syntax.

select_gender.other: Select your gender or pick 'both' if you want to act for both genders, pick 'none' if you don't want to act in gender-specific activities

help_info.other:
How to play:
- First, create a session and invite your friends using the invitation link
- Then choose The King (you can use /number command and choose Player #1 as The King)
- After that King can either send the commands directly, or you can suggest commands (anonymously of course) and The King will send these commands

Syntax. Use these as placeholders to randomize players in the commands
 ğŸ² - a random player
ğŸšº - a random girl
ğŸš¹ - a random boy

no_session_error.other: You're not in a session. Create one or ask for a link to an existent session

command_canceled.other: If there was some action I canceled it

link_session_is_old.other: The link that you've used leads to an old session. Request a new link or create a new session.

send_session_id.other: Send token of the session you want to join

session_is_too_old.other:
This session message is too old.
Use /session command to see the latest session info

session_not_found_try_again.other: A session with such an id is not found. Check the token correctness and try again

name_too_long.other: Name is too long, try to use a shorter one

suggest_command_msg.other: Type a command that will be suggested to others. Don't forget about placeholders: ğŸ², ğŸš¹, ğŸšº

no_suggested_commands.other: No suggested command in the list
